heading: HB05422
0: AN ACT DECLARING THE MONTH OF OCTOBER OF EVERY YEAR AS THE "NATIONAL COOPERATIVE MONTH" IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY
short-title: Declaring The Month Of October Of Every Year As The " National Cooperative Month " In The Entire Country
status: Approved by the House on 2020-02-04, transmitted to the Senate on 2020-02-05 and received by the Senate on 2020-02-05
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05422
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING THE MONTH OF OCTOBER OF EVERY YEAR AS THE "NATIONAL COOPERATIVE MONTH" IN THE ENTIRE COUNTRY
SHORT TITLE : Declaring The Month Of October Of Every Year As The " National Cooperative Month " In The Entire Country
ABSTRACT : Seeks to raise the consciousness of the people on the principles and values of cooperatives and encourage them to join the cooperative movement.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : CANAMA, SABINIANO S.
DATE FILED : 2019-11-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
